posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

5/30/22 - 6/05/22
Issue - V105
Current Release: 1.10.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Updates

  • Come meet the Streamlit team at Snowflake Summit!
  • The wait is over—multipage apps are here ! Now you can quickly and easily add more pages to your apps.
  • New blog post: Learn how Marcelo started his career in data science and how Streamlit helps further his projects.

Featured Content

  • UFO Sightings Dashboard in Streamlit
  • Learning Log
  • Data Pre-processing and Model Selection Web App

Tutorials/Introduction

  • Build MultiPage Python App with Streamlit | Streamlit Native Multi-Page Tutorial @1littlecoder
  • Streamlit Multi-Pages - How to work with multiple pages(2022) @Jesse_JCharis
  • Streamlit Multi-Pages!!! @rosariomoscatolab
  • Streamlit Update - Multipages made easy! - Streamlit 1.10.0
  • Update: Now It’s 4 Ways to Create a Multi-page Streamlit app
  • Streamlitの新機能マルチページを触ってみる
  • How to Build a Podcast Summarization Web APP in Python and Streamlit @misraturp
  • Streamlit Keyword Density Checker Web App | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Tutorial 2
  • Email Generator using GPT3 and openAI | Automatic Email Generator | openAI | GPT3 | Streamlit |
  • The webapp to entertain prediction and graphical exploration using Streamlit - phase I
  • Why You Need To Use Streamlit In 2022
  • 30 Days of Streamlit
  • اسخراج اطلاعات از سایت ترب با پایتون و کتابخانه streamlit
  • هاست رایگان پایتون - آموزش دپلوی کردن streamlit روی huggingface - deploy streamlit on huggingface
  • Streamlit demo
  • Streamlit introduction à la théorie
  • Live Coding Data Science App On Phone ( Termux ) - Boston House Price Prediction App With Streamlit
  • Análise de Dados com Python e Streamlit | Aula Ao Vivo | Toda Terça às 15h00
  • 2022 Data Science With Python - Streamlit Penguin Species Prediction App (Part 1: Exporting Model)
  • 2022 Data Science With Python - Streamlit Penguin Species Prediction App (Part 2: Building The App)
  • Creating Aesthetic Web Apps with StreamLit
  • Deploying a Public Machine Learning Web App using Streamlit in Python | ML Deployment
  • 2nd Deep Learning Project
  • Streamlit: entorno útil para mostrar nuestros productos de datos.
  • Building a Dashboard in Under 5 Minutes with Streamlit
  • Live Webcam with Streamlit
  • How to create and launch a Streamlit app directly from Google Colab
  • [AWS] 日本語⇒韓国語に簡単翻訳するツールを、StreamlitとAmazon ECSで作成する
  • Deploy your deep learning-based image classification model with Streamlit
  • Streamlitで""“ブロックコメント”""を表示させない方法
  • 競馬予想アプリ

NLP and Language

  • Observatorio de Noticias
  • Tweet Recommender
  • Geo-Trends
  • Who killed Laura Palmer?
  • Auto-Research

CV and Images

  • Semantic task sampling
  • Deployment of Video Classification model using Streamlit

Finance and Business

  • Warren Buffett U.S. Stocks Portfolio
  • EPS Surprise VS 3-Month Closing Price
  • Segmentasi Pelanggan Dengan Analisa RFM Dan K-Means Clustering
  • Currency Exchange Calculator
  • Analyzing the Quality of Financial Statements using Beneish Model
  • Trading Bot
  • Monitor Financeiro
  • Insurance Premium Prediction Streamlit App Demo

Geography and Society

  • Streamlit-Folium + Snowflake + OpenStreetMap @randyzwitch
  • Hurricane Mapping @giswqs
  • Prédiction des émissions de CO2 par les véhicules homologués en France
  • Aplicação web para detecção de mudanças de imagens de satélite
  • Geospatial Data Analysis of Civilian Harm in Ukraine
  • Winter Climate Analysis in Almaty, Kazakhstan

General

  • Portfolio
  • Web App Project
  • Python Code Analyzer
  • Watch your show
  • My Korvai Calculator Web App Got Pretty (Stream)LIT!
  • Recommendation System for H&M demo built with Streamlit @Mohammad_Nour

Model building and training

  • End-to-end symbolic regression with Transformers

Cool happenings and other things

  • webrtc v0.40.0 @whitphx
  • Custom notification alert box @Rushmore

Follow us

  • Twitter
